类 HttpResponseBase

  • java.lang.Object

  • 所有已实现的接口:
    HttpResponse, Response, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse, javax.servlet.ServletResponse

extends ResponseBase
implements HttpResponse, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse
